version_description: Bug fixing.

Hello, players! We are always working to make your in-game experience the best it can be so thanks for your feedback, we are always listening! With this new update we have fixed the following issues plus other 26 improvements:

- Fixed some cases where you could open the same crate multiple times.
- Mission: "Keep it Growing" Can now be completed buying multiple crates at once.
- Fixed a bug where the fire button would get stuck.
- Multiple crash solutions
- General User's Interface improvements

Also, we have improved the multiplayer host migration and adjusting some of the glowing weapons and gears. We hope you enjoy this updated Afterpulse.

See you in the game!

Hello players! New Afterpulse’s update is here!

We have been working hard on the top issues you were encountering in the game, we want you to be playing the awesome game you deserve! With this update we have fixed:
- Camera shakes in scope mode
- Resets after host migrations
- Custom Matches startup issue
We also have corrected some crashes and graphic glitches as well as optimized the user interface on iPhone X.

Additionally we have been working on a new game mode: Capture the Flag! Pick up the flag, take it to your base, score points! It is BETA for now so we expect your feedback on social media to help us refine and improve the game experience!

Thanks for all the feedback and support! And make sure you don’t drop the flag!

See you in the game!

When enemies arise, we must fight back!

We have been fighting to rule out the main technical issues that slipped into our battlefield.

Zero Score Bug - We are proud to announce that this old adversary has been defeated. Scores should now be reported correctly in multiplayer matches.

Corrected an issue which would cause some players to become un-targetable due to the combination of gear they equipped

This hasn't been a solo adventure - This accomplishment is the result of the combined efforts of the developers and our community, who should also be acknowledged.

Furthermore, we are now displaying some of the information in the interface more clearly and you will now be able to receive push notifications to stay informed on offers and new content.

For the service you have provided, we present you our sincere gratitude. May we continue fighting many battles together.

The battle of continuous improvement is never ending, we have focused our efforts into ensuring a smooth gameplay!

In the spirit of delivering AAA console gaming experiences to your mobile devices we have released a performance fix to reduce the power consumption during matches.

May you win every battle you face. See you in the battlefield!

Base to Elites!

We have released an improved version of the Trainyard map! As you are part of an exclusive combat formation, you will be required to join the fray. Muster all your courage and be ready to stalk through a hazardous and abandoned train maintenance station. You will find yourself surrounded by shipping containers and abandoned convoys all scattered around an industrial warehouse, upon which rusty wagons are resting. Beware, for there are enemies in every corner.

For this mission, the newly implemented loadout system will allow you to change your equipped items faster and more easily. Pick your combinations wisely and fill your loadout slots with your preferred balanced set of weapons and gear!

We are also excited to announce Capture the Flag mode is raising its game! Not only visual improvements have been made, but this thrilling game mode is now available to play in custom matches and in two more maps from today.

Furthermore, as requested by some members of our Afterpulse community, we have made some improvements to the matchmaking system to raise the fairness of matches.

And since we are always striving to deliver the finest quality, we have released fixes for over 33 technical issues including:

Fixed an issue which allowed players to be able to shoot through some walls from the Motel Map.

A grand adventure continues - May we continue discovering new worlds together!

This is Halloween; the time when all the creatures of the night arise. What would happen if the city was infested not by fantastic creatures but by very real human beings? To mark this special event, we have released The Nightcrawler-Dread Season, a new game mode that will allow players to defend their position from increasingly difficult waves of dangerous outcasts. Enemies will spawn from various points of a modified motel map, specially designed for this occasion.

The action takes place at night, in the rooftop of an abandoned motel. With only one ally to cover their six, this team of two players will have to test their strategic skills and stand against merciless waves of Nightcrawlers - will they succeed?

There is much more to winter warfare than simply the color. Winter can have strong effects on a battle and we’re capturing it in this new update!

Winter Warfare is here! We have released an improved version of the famous Shipwreck map. Players will boldly stride through the crisp snow of a hazardous mountain. You will find yourselves blinded by a blizzard, with reduced visibility and facing challenges that will test your abilities to survive in extreme situations.

Armed with thermal vision weapons and equipped with special Mountain Warfare uniforms to improve your performance in cold-weather, you will have the opportunity to push their strategic and survival skills to the limit!

You will not only battle your enemies, you will be standing against winter adversities in more than 3 maps that have been modified for this event - in a fight against the frost, who will be the last one standing?

Dismantle: The Best Afterpulse Experience Yet.

Afterpulse is bringing one of the most in-demand features to Afterpulse: the ability to upgrade gear!

This feature will allow you to progress your gear by dismantling other pieces of gear you no longer need!

This new implementation will enable you to take advantage of every item you have obtained so far, while at the same time, adding a new layer of fairness to everyone.

Ready to Dismantle?

Play. Win. Earn!

Sharpen your tactical edge in new matches with unique and seasonal rules, plus special rewards!

Muster all your adaptability, reflexes, and strategic Afterpulse skills: As of today a brand new difficulty level is available in the seasonal progression system!

Seize the chance to outsmart your foes and overcome new pitfalls in past Afterpulse Game Modes!

Bug Fixing.
Out of the chaos of the Pulse, a new concern has arisen. Nuclear warheads have been lost. The risks are not to be underestimated; if any nuclear device were to fall in the wrong hands it would lead to the collapse of the entire civilization.
We are calling every Elite! A Broken Arrow disaster is threatening the world and only your valiant efforts can avert this crisis. Jump into Afterpulse battlefield and capture the Control Zone that holds the nuclear device to safeguard humanity!

Our world has been poisoned by nuclear radiation! Gamma Protocol has been activated!

Our elites couldn’t secure the nuclear warheads, but this does not mean you surrender. It only means you must fight harder.

Follow the GAMMA PROTOCOL, a new game mode in which you must fight alongside your team to capture and carry the nuclear devices containing the radioactive material and save the world from radiation poisoning.

Be careful! The radiation suspended in the air is toxic to your body! You will receive damage based on the radiation intensity of toxic zones.

We are hosting electrifying and action-packed new game modes where your fierceness will determine your success, and your success will lead you to a whopping stack of materials!

In addition to this, you will now be able to choose both the frame rate and the graphics settings of the game to better suit your needs!

Play. Win. Earn! Sharpen your tactical edge in new matches with unique and seasonal rules, plus special rewards!

NEW SEASON: Immerse yourself in the Prototype Season and earn the highest tech equipment of the game. For the first time and along with the duration of the season, you will have the opportunity to acquire exclusively Hadron, C.Trace and Atom weapons and gear, when unlocking Prototype chests. Master the fate with rewarding bundles of gold and powerful weapons.

SURVIVAL SEASON: The fight for your survival will be cruel. Heighten your senses. Immense power waits for those bold enough to survive. Will you be one of them?

Game modes CAPTURE THE FLAG and TOXIC are back! Caution will be crucial for your success...

▼NEW DAILY REWARDS▼
From now on, get blue and green materials, season currency and distinctive crates when unlocking daily missions.

▼NEW SEASON PROGRESSION REWARDS▼
From now on, get blue and green materials as well as class weapon crates when leveling up through the season.

▼NEW SEASON▼
Winter is coming... and so is our WINTER WARFARE SEASON! A war awaits along with relentless extreme weather, hunger, and brutal enemies. Lead your conquest throughout the burning cold and start the strongest blizzard that will lead you to ardent new rewards: the WINTER MASTER armor and the MF-95 weapon. Do you feel the fear quaking with cold?

▼NEW SEASON▼
Getting our fireworks ready for Chinese New Year! As a way to celebrate the Year of the Ox, we bring a new season to ring in the good fortune! May wealth always come your way... and in crates!

▼NEW WEAPONS▼
Find new Dragon, Jade, and Cinnabar in the series crates and new Chrome weapons in the weekly ranking crates.

▼NEW ATOM SEASON▼
The Atom faction has reinforced its military influence, throwing off the balance of power in the world. How will the other factions react to this sudden rise of power? Elite, get up to speed to hit the battlefield and unlock season rewards.

▼SHAMROCK SERIES▼
We have just released two new epic weapons to greet St. Patrick's day!

▼ST. PATRICK'S DAY▼
Enjoy an outstanding gift and excellent offers!

▼NEW THREAT SEASON▼
We're facing a potential threat! This threat shall soon be your target! Battle through the new missions and earn a Threat Series LMG and 7* Gear, available for those fearless squads that reach the final levels.

▼GOLDEN WEEK▼
We are honoring the strength of our Japanese squads by granting shiny offers and gold deals!

▼5 DE MAYO▼
We are releasing our well-known 5 de Mayo Gear and two of the strongest shotguns, the KBS-4 YETI and DS-117!

- NEW JESTER SEASON: Join the bomber regiment by mounting explosives on everything. Unleash the aggression in the new Jester season and blow away your enemies. Immerse yourself in the flashes and smoke, while unlocking explosive rewards. Let the chaos begin!
- JESTER SPECIAL EDITION: Progress through the season and unlock exclusive and limited-edition Jester weapons.
- HANDGUN WEEK: Hone your handgun skills and reign supreme on the battlefield."
